amendment.description: To provide a substitute for section 3144, relating to support for public education in the vicinity of Los Alamos National Laboratory, New Mexico.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3169 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S5788-5789; text: CR S5788-5789) To provide a substitute for section 3144, relating to support for public education in the vicinity of Los Alamos National Laboratory, New Mexico.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3169 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
